messages.message:
fyi i have a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/43088) that affects a lot of services, and the CI build (https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-43088/10/pipeline/) currently has failing tests for reasons unrelated to my PR (cc @daniel)

i’m hoping to get this in before code cut, but it takes over an hour for each CI build to finish - is it possible to get this merged by someone with merge-override permissions? or is it possible to wait for this PR before cutting `release-23.07.0`?
does it mean all PRs without the fix will fail to merge today and not be able to make it to the code cut?
yes… I think all PRs that ran the CI after 8:46 am PST would fail. sincere aplogy:man-bowing:

How many PRs are pending on the test fix (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/43249) to be merged for 23.07? If there are many then we will push the code cut for a bit to later afternoon today
the failing tests are in `shared-utils/py-utils/builder-utils`, so i don’t think there should be too many affected PRs?

i just rebased my PR onto master since Daniel just merged his fix - the current CI build (https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-43088/12/pipeline) for my PR will probably take over an hour

so what is the concern for CP it to 23.07 after code cut? I just took a look at the PR, it touches quite a few base configs, if we wait this to be merged then we will have to wait for the dogfood to clear deployment as well
My PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/43245) was also impacted by this case. I have triggered a rebuild, which will take about 1.5 hours to finish.

Yes I can also create a backport for the PR, I was just hoping that it’d be included in the release branch from the start so that we can start doing AI Hub UAT

All AI Hub UAT for 23.07 will need to wait for my PR
@daniel is this the PR that broke the tests? https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/43148 if so we may just have to wait, since the last dogfood deployment was cut on that PR
OK we will push 23.07 code cut to around 2PM PST today
